articles.title: Disney workers plan walkout to protest 'Don't Say Gay' bill - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: ORLANDO, Fla. (AP) — Disney workers are planning walkouts during their breaks every day this week to protest CEO Bob Chapek’s slow response in publicly criticizing Florida legislation that critics have dubbed the “Don’t Say Gay” bill.
